column1: Local Foods////Before you gripe about a $10+ sandwich
column2: lemme tell you these servings are BIG. Especially if you ask them for a pretzel bun!! Thick
column3: pretzel bunny buns that serve as the perfect vessel for the nutty crunchy chicken on the inside. The chicken was moist and flavorful
column5: and although the couscous wasn't anything too noteworthy I enjoyed the Asian-influenced cabbage slaw with miso/sesame oil dressing and edamame beans.
